name: Avista Capital Partners
overview: Avista Capital Partners is a private equity firm focused on the energy, healthcare and media sectors. Avista seeks to make controlling or influential minority investments of approximately $50 million to $300 million, primarily in U.S. companies, in connection with various transaction structures including leveraged buyouts, build-ups and growth financings. Avista was formed in 2005 by seven Partners who worked together at DLJ Merchant Banking Partners (“DLJMB”), then one of the world’s largest and most successful private equity franchises in the industry.
